subject_terms_3: Religious life and practices Textile art and design
physical_appearance: This is an altar cloth. It is embroided with depictions of the figures of deities, against a background of gold thread. The faces of the figures are painted on paper and attached to the altar cloth. The top panel features a pair of phoenixes flanking a lotus bloom flower.
sgcool_label_text: The figures of the Three Star deities, of happiness, status and longevity, are embroidered on this altar cloth, against a background of gold thread. The faces, including that of the two attendant figures seem to have been painted on paper and attached to the fabric. The top panel features a pair of phoenix flanking a lotus bloom. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
title_text: Altar Cloth with Phoenix and the Three Star Deities
